data.message:
Message to Facebook. . STOP SENDING OUT / BEGGING FOR PEOPLE TO DOWN LOAD YOUR MESSENGER APP!!!!!!

GEEEZ!  NOT EVERYONE WANTS YOUR SPYWARE.

replies.message: Hi Kevin. We know there's been a lot of false and scary information going around about permissions—just to be clear, we don't turn on your camera or microphone when you aren't using the app. Learn more about how we actually use permissions for Messenger: http://on.fb.me/1qipTI7. -Natalie

We understand your concerns, Brandy. Almost all apps must ask for permissions to run. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about how Messenger actually uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/1wOC59u -Sarah

Haha, our trust is important. The fact that the YouTube implement requires just about all of my personal information and that all information is overshared with advertisers lays that idea to rest. "If you want to use the basic functions of this ubiquitous app, give us your soul. Or, if you desire to remain excluded from what are now essential functions, deny permissions." The conspiracy theories are needless when the reality itself is ridiculous.
Facebook, if our trust and input was important to you, you would realize your customers ARE NOT SATISFIED with this messenger application and it should at least be optional!!!!
